alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 8:06AM CST until January 09 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Arkansas and eastern Arkansas, including the following areas, in central Arkansas, Lonoke, Prairie, Pulaski and White. In eastern Arkansas, Monroe and Woodruff. * WHEN...Until 1015 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 806 AM CST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Little Rock, North Little Rock, Sherwood, Jacksonville, Cabot, Maumelle, Lonoke, Brinkley, Augusta, Des Arc, Hazen, De Valls Bluff, Little Rock AFB, North Little Rock Airport, Beebe, Ward, Carlisle, Austin in Lonoke County, Patterson and Fredonia. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
